title: Lowville & Watertown Take Division Crowns
text:
Lowville & Watertown Take Division Crowns   16, 2015 at 6:23   16, 2015 at 8:09 AM EDT 
The Lowville Red Raiders are the Frontier League boys' B Division soccer champs and Watertown ended Thursday with the A Division title. Lowville defeated South Jefferson 1-0 for the crown and Watertown doubled up on Indian River 2-1. Watch the video for highlights of both games.
